tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  consultation_date DATE,
  treatment_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_age INTEGER,
  consultation_date DATE,
  treatment_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE consultations (
  consultation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  consultation_date DATE,
  consultation_notes TEXT,
  consultation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    consultation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    duration INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    patient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ConsultationProgress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    progress_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    progress_description TEXT,
    progress_date DATE,
    plan_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES TreatmentPlans(plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
  consultation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  consultation_date DATE,
  consultation_time TIME,
  consultation_notes TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_plans (
  plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  consultation_id UUID,
  plan_description TEXT,
  plan_status VARCHAR(20),
  plan_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_consultation_id FOREIGN KEY (consultation_id) REFERENCES consultations(consultation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE progress_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_id UUID,
  progress_description TEXT,
  progress_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_plan_id FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES treatment_plans(plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    consultation_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Consultations (
    consultation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    doctor_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id),
    consultation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlans (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    consultation_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES Consultations(consultation_id),
    plan_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    plan_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    plan_end_date DATE NOT NULL
);
